metrics.name: Late deliveries net value
metrics.description: Net order value of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late payments. Only cases that are paid are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${late_payment_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Late payments cycle time
metrics.description: Average payment cycle time of cases with late payments
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER 
    	(WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events})))
	) FILTER (
	WHERE (${late_payment_condition})
	AND ${invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL
	)

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries net value
metrics.description: Net order value of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average delay of late deliveries
metrics.description: The average delay time of late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Cycle Time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item'))
   )
)
FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice'))

metricsVariables.name: po_item_net_order_value
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the net order value of the PO Item, for example "PO Item Net Order Value in USD"
metricsVariables.value: "PO Item Net Order Value in USD"

metricsVariables.name: goods_receipt_date
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the goods have been received, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date")

metricsVariables.name: late_delivery_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition identifying cases that are delivered too late, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
metricsVariables.value: DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

metricsVariables.name: overdue_delivery_condition
metricsVariables.description:
Condition identifying cases with an overdue delivery, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
	  AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL
metricsVariables.value: DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date" AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL

metricsVariables.name: late_payment_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition that identifies cases with invoices paid late, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"
metricsVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

metricsVariables.name: invoice_clearing_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: delivery_completed_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition indicating that the delivery for a PO Item is completed, for example "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes'

metricsVariables.name: delivery_due_date
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the delivery is due, for example "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

metricsVariables.name: invoice_clearing_date
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

metricsVariables.name: invoice_receipt_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Record Invoice Receipt', 'Create FI Invoice'

processVariables.name: PO Item Net Order Value in USD
processVariables.displayName: PO Item Net Order Value in USD

blocks.text: This dashboard provides a breakdown of your vendor's performance.
- Page 1: Key metrics to get a picture of your vendor performance
- Page 2: Deep dive into further analysis of your vendors looking at key aspects
- Page 3: A list of Case details in order to look further into root causes
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

children.name: No. of Vendors with Cycle Time > Avg. Cycle Time
Average cycle time from PO Creation to Create FI Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average cycle time from Release PO to Good Receipt by vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Release PO')) ))
) AS "Average cycle time", "PO Vendor Name"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 500

parameter.name: PO Item Net Order Value in USD

children.name: Average cycle time from PO creation to PO Acknowledgement by vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Release PO')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
) AS "Average cycle time", "PO Vendor Name"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 500

SELECT 
--"PO Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Code",
"PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name",
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Document Curr.") AS "Inv Amount",
COUNT ("CASE_ID") AS "No. of Cases",
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PR Item')) ))
) AS "Confirmation time for PRs" , 
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
) AS "Processing time for POs", 
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Release PO')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
) AS "PO Creation to PO Release", 
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Release PO')) ))
) AS "PO Released to Goods Receipt",
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')) ))
) AS "Goods Receipt to Create FI Invoice",
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Clear Invoice')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')) ))
) AS "Create FI Invoice to Clear Invoice",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) 
AS "Avg total cycle time"

FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 3 Desc

SELECT "PO Vendor Name", "PO Vendor Number", "PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1", "PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 2", "PO Vendor Master Net Payment Days", "PO Vendor Master Terms of Payment Key"
FROM "This_Process"
WHERE "PO Vendor Name" IS not NULL
LIMIT 25
